alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 3:51PM CST until December 15 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CST FOR WESTERN DOUGLAS AND NORTHEASTERN SAUNDERS COUNTIES... At 351 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located near Mead, or 22 miles west of Omaha, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Valley, Waterloo and Elkhorn around 400 PM CST. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
